caption.p: Scatter plots showing relationships between the phenolic content and antioxidant activities in different commercial natural soaps after cold saponification. HPC = hydrophilic phenolic content, LPC = lipophilic phenolic content, TPC = total phenolic content, HAA = hydrophilic antioxidant activity, LAA = lipophilic antioxidant activity, TAA = total antioxidant activity.
